Ida-Virumaa

description.et: .Net raamistiku baasil tarkvaraarendus väiksemas meeskonnas. .Net raamistiku olemus ning peamised tehnoloogiad, pöördumine andmeallikate poole. C# programmeerimiskeel. LINQ päringukeel.

objectives.et: Arendada õppija programmeerimise ja meeskonnatöö oskuseid, andes vajalikud erialased teadmised ja oskused.

learning_outcomes.et:
Kursuse läbinud üliõpilane: 

- kirjeldab .Net raamistiku olemust ning peamisi tehnoloogiaid. 

- koostab C# programmeerimiskeeles lihtsamaid rakendusi või suurema tarkvaralahenduse osiseid. 

- koostab lisamaterjale kasutades LINQ päringukeeles päringuid ning kasutada vajadusel .Net raamistiku vahendeid levinumate andmeallikate (XML, andmebaasiserverid ning failid) poole pöördumiseks. 

- töötab erialases meeskonnas.

description.et: 5 Point for Proposal + 5 Mock up Presentation + 30 Final Project	= 30
Assignments = 25 points
Exercises/Hands-on = 30 points

grade_preconditions.et: >= 50 points from Exercises, Assignments and Project

assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)

resources.mandatory_materials: Starting out with Visual C# (5th Edition) 5th Edition by Tony Gaddis
resources.recommended_materials:
1. C# 8.0	.NET Core 3.0	Visual Studio 2019
2. C# Programming Guide: https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/67ef8sbd.aspx
3. C# Tutorials: https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/aa288436(v=vs.71).aspx

description.et: Introduction about course, .Net Framework Overview, CLR, CTS, CLS, Stack vs Heap, Type Categories
.Net Framework Architecture, Namespace, C# Language, Programming with C#, CLI
C# Tool and IDEs, Introduction to object-orientation and C#,
C# History, Datatype, Variables, Operations, and Expression
Making Decisions and Performing Iterations in C#
Working with Methods and Handling Exceptions in C#
Introduction about Complex Data Structure, Working with Array, Working with Enumerations (enum), Working with Structures (struct)
Introduction about Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) in C# (Class, Encapsulation, Static Methods and Static Class, Anonymous Class)
Resource Management in C# (Garbage Collection)
Collection in C#
Generic in C#
Events and Delegates in C#
Introduction about LINQ
Guest Lecture from Industry
Visual Studio .Net Development Environment and Keyboard Shortcuts, Get start with visual studio and C#
Datatype, Variables, Operations, and Expression
Demo Exercise. Program Example and Explanations
Making Decisions and Performing Iterations in C#
Working with Methods and Handling Exceptions in C#
Introducing Complex Data Structure, Working with Array, Working with Enumerations (enum), Working with Structures (struct)
Introduction about Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) in C# (Class, Encapsulation, Static Methods and Static Class, Anonymous Class)
Resource Management in C# (Garbage Collection)
Collection in C#
Generic in C#
Project Proposal/Mockup Presentations
